<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pinning Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=6013) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You use Flurry of Blows to make two ranged piercing weapon [Strikes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against the same target.

</column>

---

You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with a series of piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface. If both your attacks hit, the target must succeed at a Reflex save against your class DC or become [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) until it or an adjacent creature succeeds at a DC 10 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to remove the pinning projectiles. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a [water elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=412) or some [oozes](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=453)), or could otherwise escape without effort.
name: Pinning Fire
